text.div:
Structure
LinkIdTextCardinalityTypeFlagsDescription & Constraints
EmCare.B22.RespiratoryRateQuestionnairehttps://fhir.dk.swisstph-mis.ch/matchbox/fhir/Questionnaire/emcare.b22.respiratoryrate#0.1.0
AgeInMonthsAge0..1integerExpressions:
  • Initial Value: ageinmonths
Respiratory Rate profilenull0..1quantityExpressions:
  • Initial Value: respiratory rate profile
force-collectionnull0..1booleanExpressions:
  • Initial Value: force-collection
Respiratory Rate Second Count Profilenull0..1quantityExpressions:
  • Initial Value: respiratory rate second count profile
Fast Breathing profilenull0..1booleanExpressions:
  • Initial Value: fast breathing profile
EmCare.B22.DE01Respiratory Rate (breaths per minute)1..1quantityExpressions:
  • Enable When: %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B22.DE02').answer.first().empty() and %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='Respiratory Rate profile').answer.first().empty()
  • Calculated Value: iif(%resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='Respiratory Rate profile').answer.first().exists(), %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='Respiratory Rate profile').answer.first().value,{})
EmCare.B22.DE01-help<b>Count the number of breaths the child takes per minute</b> to determine if fast breathing is present.<br /> It is <b>very important that the child is calm</b> and still. If the child is moving or crying, you will not be able to get an accurate count of breaths. <br /> <b>To count the breaths per minute,</b> use a watch with a second hand or a digital watch. Look for the breathing movement anywhere on the child’s chest or abdomen. <br /> The number of breaths for <b>‘fast breathing’ depends on the child’s age.</b></p> <ul> <li>Under 2 months: More than 60 breaths per minute*</li> <li>2 to 11 months: More than 50 breaths per minute</li> <li>12 to 59 months: More than 40 breaths per minute</li> </ul> <p>*In young infants, a second measurement should be taken to confirm, unless there is already another sign of possible serious bacterial infection0..1display
EmCare.B22.DE02null0..*choiceOptions: 1 option
Expressions:
  • Enable When: %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B22.DE01').answer.first().empty() and %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='Respiratory Rate profile').answer.first().empty() and %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='force-collection').answer.first().value = false
secondnull0..1groupExpressions:
  • Enable When: %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='AgeInMonths').answer.first().value < 2 and (%resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='Respiratory Rate profile').answer.first().value > 60 '{Breaths}/min' or %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B22.DE01').answer.first().value >= 60 '{Breaths}/min') and %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='Respiratory Rate Second Count Profile').answer.first().empty()
EmCare.B22.DE04Respiratory Rate Second Count (breaths per minute)0..1quantityExpressions:
  • Enable When: %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='second').repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B22.DE05').answer.first().empty()
EmCare.B22.DE04-help<b>Count the number of breaths the child takes per minute</b> to determine if fast breathing is present.<br /> It is <b>very important that the child is calm</b> and still. If the child is moving or crying, you will not be able to get an accurate count of breaths. <br /> <b>To count the breaths per minute,</b> use a watch with a second hand or a digital watch. Look for the breathing movement anywhere on the child’s chest or abdomen. <br /> The number of breaths for <b>‘fast breathing’ depends on the child’s age.</b></p> <ul> <li>Under 2 months: More than 60 breaths per minute*</li> <li>2 to 11 months: More than 50 breaths per minute</li> <li>12 to 59 months: More than 40 breaths per minute</li> </ul> <p>*In young infants, a second measurement should be taken to confirm, unless there is already another sign of possible serious bacterial infection0..1display
EmCare.B22.DE05null0..*choiceOptions: 1 option
Expressions:
  • Enable When: %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='second').repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B22.DE04').answer.first().empty()
EmCare.B22.DE07Fast Breathing0..1booleanExpressions:
  • Enable When: %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='Fast Breathing profile').answer.first().empty() and (%resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='AgeInMonths').answer.first().value >= 2 or %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='second').repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B22.DE04').answer.first().exists() or %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='second').repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B22.DE05').answer.first().exists() or %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B22.DE01').answer.first().value < 60 '{Breaths}/min')
  • Calculated Value: iif(%resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='Fast Breathing profile').answer.first().empty() and (%resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='AgeInMonths').answer.first().value >= 2 or %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='second').repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B22.DE04').answer.first().exists() or %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='second').repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B22.DE05').answer.first().exists() or %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B22.DE01').answer.first().value < 60 '{Breaths}/min'),iif(%resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='AgeInMonths').answer.first().value<2 and (%resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='second').repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B22.DE04').answer.first().value >= 60 '{Breaths}/min' or (%resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='second').repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B22.DE05').answer.first().exists() and ( %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B22.DE01').answer.first().value >= 60 '{Breaths}/min' or %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='Respiratory Rate profile').answer.first().value >= 60 '{Breaths}/min' ) ) ) or %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B22.DE01').answer.first().value >= 50 '{Breaths}/min' and %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='AgeInMonths').answer.first().value < 12 and %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='AgeInMonths').answer.first().value >= 2or %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B22.DE01').answer.first().value >= 40 '{Breaths}/min' and %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='AgeInMonths').answer.first().value>=12 and %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='AgeInMonths').answer.first().value < 60, true, false),{})
EmCare.B22.DE07-helpThe number of breaths for <b>‘fast breathing’ depends on the child’s age.</b> * Under 2 months: More than 60 breaths per minute* * 2 to 11 months: More than 50 breaths per minute * 12 to 59 months: More than 40 breaths per minute *In young infants, a second measurement should be taken to confirm, unless there is already another sign of possible serious bacterial infection0..1display
timestampnull0..1dateTimeExpressions:
  • Calculated Value: now()

Documentation for this format

Option Sets

Answer options for EmCare.B22.DE02

  • null#EmCare.B22.DE02 ("Unable to perform Respiratory Rate at this time")

Answer options for EmCare.B22.DE05

  • null#EmCare.B22.DE05 ("Respiratory Rate Second Count Not Possible")

item.text:
Count the number of breaths the child takes per minute to determine if fast breathing is present.
It is very important that the child is calm and still. If the child is moving or crying, you will not be able to get an accurate count of breaths.
To count the breaths per minute, use a watch with a second hand or a digital watch. Look for the breathing movement anywhere on the child’s chest or abdomen.
The number of breaths for ‘fast breathing’ depends on the child’s age.

  • Under 2 months: More than 60 breaths per minute*
  • 2 to 11 months: More than 50 breaths per minute
  • 12 to 59 months: More than 40 breaths per minute

*In young infants, a second measurement should be taken to confirm, unless there is already another sign of possible serious bacterial infection

valueCoding.display: Unable to perform Respiratory Rate at this time

valueExpression.expression: %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='AgeInMonths').answer.first().value < 2 and (%resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='Respiratory Rate profile').answer.first().value > 60 '{Breaths}/min' or %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B22.DE01').answer.first().value >= 60 '{Breaths}/min') and   %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='Respiratory Rate Second Count Profile').answer.first().empty()

item.text: Respiratory Rate Second Count (breaths per minute)

Count the number of breaths the child takes per minute to determine if fast breathing is present.
It is very important that the child is calm and still. If the child is moving or crying, you will not be able to get an accurate count of breaths.
To count the breaths per minute, use a watch with a second hand or a digital watch. Look for the breathing movement anywhere on the child’s chest or abdomen.
The number of breaths for ‘fast breathing’ depends on the child’s age.

  • Under 2 months: More than 60 breaths per minute*
  • 2 to 11 months: More than 50 breaths per minute
  • 12 to 59 months: More than 40 breaths per minute

*In young infants, a second measurement should be taken to confirm, unless there is already another sign of possible serious bacterial infection

valueCoding.display: Respiratory Rate Second Count Not Possible

valueExpression.expression: %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='Fast Breathing profile').answer.first().empty() and (%resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='AgeInMonths').answer.first().value >= 2 or %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='second').repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B22.DE04').answer.first().exists() or  %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='second').repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B22.DE05').answer.first().exists() or  %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B22.DE01').answer.first().value < 60 '{Breaths}/min')

iif(%resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='Fast Breathing profile').answer.first().empty() and (%resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='AgeInMonths').answer.first().value >= 2 or %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='second').repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B22.DE04').answer.first().exists() or  %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='second').repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B22.DE05').answer.first().exists() or  %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B22.DE01').answer.first().value < 60 '{Breaths}/min'),iif(%resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='AgeInMonths').answer.first().value<2 and (%resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='second').repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B22.DE04').answer.first().value >= 60 '{Breaths}/min' or (%resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='second').repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B22.DE05').answer.first().exists()  and ( %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B22.DE01').answer.first().value  >= 60 '{Breaths}/min'  or %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='Respiratory Rate profile').answer.first().value  >= 60 '{Breaths}/min' ) ) ) or %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B22.DE01').answer.first().value >= 50 '{Breaths}/min' and %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='AgeInMonths').answer.first().value < 12 and %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='AgeInMonths').answer.first().value >= 2or %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='EmCare.B22.DE01').answer.first().value >= 40 '{Breaths}/min' and %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='AgeInMonths').answer.first().value>=12 and %resource.repeat(item).where(linkId='AgeInMonths').answer.first().value < 60, true, false),{})

item.text: The number of breaths for ‘fast breathing’ depends on the child’s age. * Under 2 months: More than 60 breaths per minute* * 2 to 11 months: More than 50 breaths per minute * 12 to 59 months: More than 40 breaths per minute *In young infants, a second measurement should be taken to confirm, unless there is already another sign of possible serious bacterial infection
